greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: row n lists the parts > 1 of the last section of the set of partitions of n.
comment: See A138138 and A138151 for more information.
link: Robert Price, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..9514, 25 rows.
mathematica: Join[{0}, Table[Cases[IntegerPartitions[n], x_ /; Last[x] != 1], {n, 10}]] // Flatten (* _Robert Price_, May 22 2020 *)
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Mar 23 2008
